author: Gerry Moriarty
title: Twenty new Covid-19 cases confirmed in Northern Ireland
description: Deputy First Minister Michelle O’Neill close to tears when taking question on virus emergency
content:
The number of coronavirus cases in Northern Ireland has increased by 20 as from Monday afternoon, bringing the number of cases in the North to 148, the Norths Department of Health has announced. 
There also were twenty new cases reported on Sunday. To date t… [+2038 chars]
